page.title: 05Dent C.of E.Primary School.
page.content: The school has no uniform and very few rules,the main rule is (NEVER RUN INSIDE SCHOOL),this helps prevent accidents;the other rule is(DON'T SWEAR),anyone who forgets this has a hundred lines or more to write out. Teachers make education interesting by taking pupils out of school to look at the local environment in order to study wild flowers,insects,rocks,the river and farming. Junior children have the chance of visiting places such as London, Edinburgh,Wales,Chester and so on, staying away from home for three or four nights at a time.Day trips are organised to places like Bradford, Lancaster,Morcambe and Kendal. We perform pantomimes and nativities at Christmas,take special services in Church,welcome parents and visitors into our school.It's fun!
